All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminBrowseEventsActivity
Activity that allows the administrator to view all events and delete them if necessary.
AdminBrowseImagesActivity
Activity that lets the admin browse all event images and open a selected image for full view or deletion.
AdminBrowseProfilesActivity
Activity that allows administrators to browse, delete, and manage user profiles.
AdminEvent
Represents a simplified admin-side view of an event.
AdminEventAdapter
RecyclerView adapter used by the admin panel to display a list of events in the Browse Events screen.
AdminEventAdapterTest
 
AdminEventTest
Unit tests for the AdminEvent model class.
AdminHomeActivity
The main landing screen for administrators.
AdminHomeActivityTest
 
AdminImageAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying event images in the admin panel.
AdminImageAdapter.ImageItem
Model class representing an event image stored in Firestore.
AdminImageAdapter.OnImageClick
Callback interface used to notify when an image entry is clicked.
AdminImageAdapterTest
 
AdminNotificationLogAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying notification logs in the admin panel.
AdminNotificationLogAdapter.NotificationLog
Local model representing one notification log entry.
AdminNotificationLogsActivity
Activity that allows administrators to review logs of all notifications sent to entrants by organizers.
AdminProfileAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying all user profiles in the admin panel.
AdminProfileAdapter.OnBanClickListener
Listener for banning/unbanning organizer mode.
AdminProfileAdapter.OnDeleteClickListener
Listener for deleting a profile.
AdminProfileAdapter.UserProfile
Local model representing one user's profile info.
AdminProfileAdapterTest
 
AdminViewImageActivity
Activity that displays a single event image in full screen and allows the administrator to delete it.

The main activity for user authentication.
AuthActivityTest
 
AuthViewPagerAdapter
Adapter for the ViewPager2 in AuthActivity.
CreateEventActivity
Activity for creating or editing events.
CreateEventActivity.OnEventSavedListener
Interface for listening to event save completion events.
CreateEventPagerAdapter
Adapter for the ViewPager2 in CreateEventActivity.
CreateEventStep1Fragment
First step fragment in the event creation process.
CreateEventStep2Fragment
Second step in the event creation process, collecting event date information.
CreateEventStep3Fragment
Third step in the event creation process, collecting registration date information.
CreateEventStep4Fragment
Fourth step in the event creation process, collecting participant limits and event settings.
CreateEventStep5Fragment
Fifth step in the event creation process, allowing the organizer to upload an event poster image.
CreateEventStep6Fragment
Sixth and final step in the event creation process, displaying a summary of all entered event details.
CreateEventViewModel
ViewModel for the event creation process.
CsvExportController
Controller class for exporting event entrant lists to CSV format.
CustomDatePickerDialog
Custom date picker dialog for selecting dates in the Event Lottery application.
CustomDatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener
Interface for receiving callbacks when a date is selected in the dialog.
DateTimeFormat
Utility class for converting between Date objects and Firebase-compatible string formats.
Entrant
Represents an entrant (participant) in an event lottery.
EntrantHomePage
Main home page activity for entrants (participants).
EntrantHomePageActivity
Main home page activity for entrants (participants).
EntrantListActivity
Displays and manages the waiting list for an event.
EntrantListAdapter
Adapter for the entrant RecyclerView in EntrantListActivity.
EntrantViewPagerAdapter
Adapter for the ViewPager2 in EntrantHomePageActivity.
Event
Represents an event in the Event Lottery application.
EventAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying event cards in the organizer's event list.
EventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on event items.
EventDetailsActivity
Activity displaying detailed information about an event for entrants.
EventItem
Represents an event item for display in entrant views.
EventsListFragment
A fragment representing a list of Items.
EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of events in the EventsListFragment.
EventsListRecyclerViewAdapter.onEventClickListener
Interface for handling clicks on event items.
EventStatsController
Controller for retrieving event statistics from Firestore.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
ExampleUnitTest
Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
FinalizedListActivity
Activity for displaying and managing the finalized list of selected entrants.
InvitationResponseActivity
Activity for responding to event invitations.
JoinConfirmationFragment
Bottom sheet dialog fragment for confirming event waitlist join.
LeaveConfirmationFragment
Bottom sheet dialog fragment for confirming leaving an event's waiting list.
LoginFragment
Fragment for user login functionality.
LotteryController
Controller for managing lottery operations User stories: - US 01.05.02: Accept invitation - US 01.05.03: Decline invitation

LotteryController.DeclineCallback
 
LotteryResultsActivity
Activity for displaying lottery results after a draw has been completed.
MainActivity
Main entry point activity for the Event Lottery application.
MyEventItem
Represents an event item with status information for the current user.
MyEventItem.Status
Enumeration of possible statuses for an event from the user's perspective.
MyEventsFragment
Fragment displaying the user's events with filtering capabilities.
MyEventsFragment
Fragment displaying the organizer's events in a grid layout.
MyEventsFragment.EventWithId
Helper class to store an event along with its Firestore document ID.

Callback interface for status retrieval.
MyEventsListRecyclerViewAdapter

Represents a notification in the Event Lottery application.
Notification.NotificationLoadCallback
Callback interface for asynchronous notification loading from Firestore.

Interface for listening to selection changes in the adapter.

Controller for managing and sending notifications to users.
NotificationsFragment
Fragment displaying a list of notifications for the current user.

Activity for notifying entrants (selected, waitlisted, or cancelled) about event updates.

A placeholder item representing a piece of content.
